attributes.action: give better assistance to Part Time workers who continue to claim Jobseekers Allowance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a previous part-time worker, now solely on Jobseekers Allowance, I found it annoying to declare my earnings to the DWP, only to have them take everything barring £5 per week off me.  This gives people no incentive to look for work, since they know they are only going to be £10 a week better off if they do the right thing and declare their income.

I petition the Prime Minister to seek a change to the rules of part-time work and JSA to allow claimants to keep more of their earnings, so they get the taste for having an income of their own without losing their safety net.
